004
005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj;
006
007import edu.wpi.first.hal.CTREPCMJNI;
008import edu.wpi.first.util.sendable.Sendable;
009import edu.wpi.first.util.sendable.SendableBuilder;
010import edu.wpi.first.util.sendable.SendableRegistry;
011
012public class PneumaticsControlModule implements PneumaticsBase, Sendable {
013  private final int m_handle;
014  private final int m_module;
015  private int m_reservedMask;
016  private final Object m_reserveLock = new Object();
017
018  public PneumaticsControlModule() {
019    this(SensorUtil.getDefaultCTREPCMModule());
020  }
021
022  /**
023   * Constructs a PneumaticsControlModule.
024   *
025   * @param module module number to construct
026   */
027  public PneumaticsControlModule(int module) {
028    m_handle = CTREPCMJNI.initialize(module);
029    m_module = module;
030
031    SendableRegistry.addLW(this, "Compressor", module);
032  }
033
034  @Override
035  public void close() {
036    CTREPCMJNI.free(m_handle);
037    SendableRegistry.remove(this);
038  }
039
040  public boolean getCompressor() {
041    return CTREPCMJNI.getCompressor(m_handle);
042  }
043
044  public void setClosedLoopControl(boolean enabled) {
045    CTREPCMJNI.setClosedLoopControl(m_handle, enabled);
046  }
047
048  public boolean getClosedLoopControl() {
049    return CTREPCMJNI.getClosedLoopControl(m_handle);
050  }
051
052  public boolean getPressureSwitch() {
053    return CTREPCMJNI.getPressureSwitch(m_handle);
054  }
055
056  public double getCompressorCurrent() {
057    return CTREPCMJNI.getCompressorCurrent(m_handle);
058  }
059
060  public boolean getCompressorCurrentTooHighFault() {
061    return CTREPCMJNI.getCompressorCurrentTooHighFault(m_handle);
062  }
063
064  public boolean getCompressorCurrentTooHighStickyFault() {
065    return CTREPCMJNI.getCompressorCurrentTooHighStickyFault(m_handle);
066  }
067
068  public boolean getCompressorShortedFault() {
069    return CTREPCMJNI.getCompressorShortedFault(m_handle);
070  }
071
072  public boolean getCompressorShortedStickyFault() {
073    return CTREPCMJNI.getCompressorShortedStickyFault(m_handle);
074  }
075
076  public boolean getCompressorNotConnectedFault() {
077    return CTREPCMJNI.getCompressorNotConnectedFault(m_handle);
078  }
079
080  public boolean getCompressorNotConnectedStickyFault() {
081    return CTREPCMJNI.getCompressorNotConnectedStickyFault(m_handle);
082  }
083
084  @Override
085  public void setSolenoids(int mask, int values) {
086    CTREPCMJNI.setSolenoids(m_handle, mask, values);
087  }
088
089  @Override
090  public int getSolenoids() {
091    return CTREPCMJNI.getSolenoids(m_handle);
092  }
093
094  @Override
095  public int getModuleNumber() {
096    return m_module;
097  }
098
099  @Override
100  public int getSolenoidDisabledList() {
101    return CTREPCMJNI.getSolenoidDisabledList(m_handle);
102  }
103
104  public boolean getSolenoidVoltageFault() {
105    return CTREPCMJNI.getSolenoidVoltageFault(m_handle);
106  }
107
108  public boolean getSolenoidVoltageStickyFault() {
109    return CTREPCMJNI.getSolenoidVoltageStickyFault(m_handle);
110  }
111
112  public void clearAllStickyFaults() {
113    CTREPCMJNI.clearAllStickyFaults(m_handle);
114  }
115
116  @Override
117  public void fireOneShot(int index) {
118    CTREPCMJNI.fireOneShot(m_handle, index);
119  }
120
121  @Override
122  public void setOneShotDuration(int index, int durMs) {
123    CTREPCMJNI.setOneShotDuration(m_handle, index, durMs);
124  }
125
126  @Override
127  public boolean checkSolenoidChannel(int channel) {
128    return CTREPCMJNI.checkSolenoidChannel(channel);
129  }
130
131  @Override
132  public int checkAndReserveSolenoids(int mask) {
133    synchronized (m_reserveLock) {
134      if ((m_reservedMask & mask) != 0) {
135        return m_reservedMask & mask;
136      }
137      m_reservedMask |= mask;
138      return 0;
139    }
140  }
141
142  @Override
143  public void unreserveSolenoids(int mask) {
144    synchronized (m_reserveLock) {
145      m_reservedMask &= ~mask;
146    }
147  }
148
149  @Override
150  public void initSendable(SendableBuilder builder) {
151    builder.setSmartDashboardType("Compressor");
152    builder.addBooleanProperty(
153        "Closed Loop Control", this::getClosedLoopControl, this::setClosedLoopControl);
154    builder.addBooleanProperty("Enabled", this::getCompressor, null);
155    builder.addBooleanProperty("Pressure switch", this::getPressureSwitch, null);
156  }
157}
